bibl.title: Ben cao gang mu dictionary Vol1

sense.def: Pathological Condition Combined Designation of all types of sweating. Ji sheng fang 濟生方 lists a Zhu han men 諸汗門 , “Section: all types of sweating ”. Yi xue ru men 醫學入門 3: 諸汗不止者，防术牡蠣湯，外用米粉撲乾 , “In all cases of sweating that does not end, [ingest] the decoction with fang [ feng ], [ bai ] zhu , and mu li . Externally swab and dry [the sweating body] with ground rice powder”.
